SARATOGA Unloose Lubricant 300ml

SARATOGA

Saratoga LASER is the strong throwing power fluid that melts the rust, incrustations, saltiness; it loosens in a very short time the mechanical fits, screws, bolts, hinges, bearings, locks, connections. It does not corrode metals, varnishes or rubber. It eliminates the humidity from the electric circuit; it lubricates and protects from the corrosion and the oxidation. The valve “All Positions” consents the use of the bomb in whichever position. APPLICATION: Spray directly on the part to loosen. Leave the fluid to penetrate, therefore to unbolt.
